|brand = MIFON |model = X1 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = XR2142T |wlclass = AX6600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4908;BCM4908KFEBG; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 (v8) |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF4G18AC-TI; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16TW-107:P;9YP75 D9SHD,DDR3L; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;BCM54991E; |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 (Type A) |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, 1024QAM, MU-MIMO, display, heatsink |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN HP FEM;Skyworks;SKY85337-11;;2; ,,, 5GHz (235F) WLAN HP FEM;Skyworks;SKY85743-21;;2; ,,, 5GHz (697F) WLAN HP FEM;Skyworks;SKY85743-21;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.51.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 05/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6710;BCM6710KFFBG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 574 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM6710;BCM6710KFFBG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 1201 |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|rad3chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43684;BCM43684KRFBG; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = U.FL |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad3ax = 4804 |rad3ac = 1733 |rad3n = 600 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5 |rad3correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad3cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *802.11ax 4T4R WLAN (AX6600) *1x 1GbE/2.5GbE WAN ports *4x 1GbE LAN (LAN4 - Game) *2x USB 3.0 (Type A) ports
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.acwifi.net/11876.html ''MIFON X1 Gigabit Router Teardown'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN) *[https://www.acwifi.net/9538.html ''TP-LINK XDR6060 Router Teardown'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] (CN)
